Class DoseCalculator

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.medicine.pharmacology.DoseCalculator
public class DoseCalculator extends Object
Weight-based medication dose calculator.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static double
    bsaBasedDose(double dosePerM2, double bsa)
    Calculates dose based on BSA. dose = dosePerM2 * BSA
    static double
    clarksRule(double adultDoseMg, Quantity<Mass> childWeight)
    Pediatric dose using Clark's rule.
    static double
    creatinineClearance(int ageYears, Quantity<Mass> weight, double serumCreatinineMgDl, boolean isFemale)
    Creatinine clearance (Cockcroft-Gault).
    static double
    ivDripRate(double totalDoseMg, double concentrationMgPerMl, double infusionHours)
    Calculates IV drip rate. rate = (dose_mg * volume_ml) / (concentration_mg_per_ml * time_hours)
    static double
    weightBasedDose(double dosePerKg, Quantity<Mass> weight)
    Calculates dose based on weight. dose = dosePerKg * weight
    static double

    Pediatric dose using Young's rule.

  • Method Details

    • weightBasedDose

      public static double weightBasedDose(double dosePerKg, Quantity<Mass> weight)
      Calculates dose based on weight. dose = dosePerKg * weight
      Parameters:
      dosePerKg - Dose per kg (mg/kg)
      weight - Patient weight
      Returns:
      Total dose in mg

    • bsaBasedDose

      public static double bsaBasedDose(double dosePerM2, double bsa)
      Calculates dose based on BSA. dose = dosePerM2 * BSA
      Parameters:
      dosePerM2 - Dose per m² (mg/m²)
      bsa - Body surface area in m²
      Returns:
      Total dose in mg

    • ivDripRate

      public static double ivDripRate(double totalDoseMg, double concentrationMgPerMl, double infusionHours)
      Calculates IV drip rate. rate = (dose_mg * volume_ml) / (concentration_mg_per_ml * time_hours)
      Returns:
      ml/hour

    • clarksRule

      public static double clarksRule(double adultDoseMg, Quantity<Mass> childWeight)
      Pediatric dose using Clark's rule. Child dose = (weight_lbs / 150) * adult_dose

    • youngsRule

      public static double youngsRule(double adultDoseMg, int ageYears)
      Pediatric dose using Young's rule. Child dose = (age / (age + 12)) * adult_dose

    • creatinineClearance

      public static double creatinineClearance(int ageYears, Quantity<Mass> weight, double serumCreatinineMgDl, boolean isFemale)
      Creatinine clearance (Cockcroft-Gault). CrCl = ((140 - age) * weight * [0.85 if female]) / (72 * serum_creatinine)
